sentences.hanzi: 你好吗？
sentences.pinyin: nǐ hǎo ma?
sentences.translation: How are you?

sentences.hanzi: 我很好。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ hěn hǎo.
sentences.translation: I'm fine.

sentences.hanzi: 早上好！
sentences.pinyin: zǎo shang hǎo!
sentences.translation: Good morning!

sentences.hanzi: 晚安。
sentences.pinyin: wǎn ān.
sentences.translation: Good night.

sentences.hanzi: 我爱你。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ ài nǐ.
sentences.translation: I love you.

sentences.hanzi: 我饿了。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ è le.
sentences.translation: I'm hungry.

sentences.hanzi: 我渴了。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ kě le.
sentences.translation: I'm thirsty.

sentences.hanzi: 这是什么？
sentences.pinyin: zhè shì shén me?
sentences.translation: What is this?

sentences.hanzi: 那是一本书。
sentences.pinyin: nà shì yì běn shū.
sentences.translation: That is a book.

sentences.hanzi: 我喜欢苹果。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan píng guǒ.
sentences.translation: I like apples.

sentences.hanzi: 今天天气很好。
sentences.pinyin: jīn tiān tiān qì hěn hǎo.
sentences.translation: The weather is nice today.

sentences.hanzi: 我在学习。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ zài xué xí.
sentences.translation: I am studying.

sentences.hanzi: 请帮帮我。
sentences.pinyin: qǐng bāng bang wǒ.
sentences.translation: Please help me.

sentences.hanzi: 对不起。
sentences.pinyin: duì bu qǐ.
sentences.translation: I'm sorry.

sentences.hanzi: 没关系。
sentences.pinyin: méi guān xi.
sentences.translation: It's okay.

sentences.hanzi: 呼——，轻轻，轻轻，秋风来了！
sentences.pinyin: hū——, qīng qīng, qīng qīng, qiū fēng lái le!
sentences.translation: "Whoosh—", softly, softly, the autumn wind is here!

sentences.hanzi: 她是位辛勤的收藏家，你知道吗？
sentences.pinyin: tā shì wèi xīn qín de shōu cáng jiā, nǐ zhī dào ma?
sentences.translation: She is a diligent collector, do you know?

sentences.hanzi: 看，她的家园好大好大！
sentences.pinyin: kàn, tā de jiā yuán hǎo dà hǎo dà!
sentences.translation: Look, her home is so big, so big!

sentences.hanzi: 她把绿色的树叶收藏，把金黄的果实收藏。
sentences.pinyin: tā bǎ lǜ sè de shù yè shōu cáng, bǎ jīn huáng de guǒ shí shōu cáng.
sentences.translation: She collects the green leaves, collects the golden fruits.

sentences.hanzi: 把天空的湛蓝收藏，把小溪的叮咚歌唱收藏。
sentences.pinyin: bǎ tiān kōng de zhàn lán shōu cáng, bǎ xiǎo xī de dīng dōng gē chàng shōu cáng.
sentences.translation: Collects the azure blue of the sky, collects the tinkling song of the stream.

sentences.hanzi: 哦？她忘记收藏枫叶的红了吗？
sentences.pinyin: ò? tā wàng jì shōu cáng fēng yè de hóng le ma?
sentences.translation: Oh? Did she forget to collect the red of the maple leaves?

sentences.hanzi: 不是！嘻嘻，她呀，要在枫叶上写下红色的信。
sentences.pinyin: bú shì! xī xī, tā ya, yào zài fēng yè shàng xiě xià hóng sè de xìn.
sentences.translation: No! Hehe, she wants to write a red letter on the maple leaves.

sentences.hanzi: 藏进南飞的大雁的翅膀里，告诉南方的小朋友：
sentences.pinyin: cáng jìn nán fēi de dà yàn de chì bǎng lǐ, gào su nán fāng de xiǎo péng you:
sentences.translation: Hidden in the wings of the southward-flying geese, to tell the children in the south:

sentences.hanzi: 北方的童话多么优美，好听的故事有多长，多长……
sentences.pinyin: běi fāng de tóng huà duō me yōu měi, hǎo tīng de gù shi yǒu duō cháng, duō cháng……
sentences.translation: How beautiful the fairy tales from the north are, how long, how long are the wonderful stories...

sentences.hanzi: 这是个小秘密，你千万不要和别人讲！
sentences.pinyin: zhè shì ge xiǎo mì mì, nǐ qiān wàn bú yào hé bié rén jiǎng!
sentences.translation: This is a little secret, you must not tell anyone else!

sentences.hanzi: 什么上山吱扭扭？什么下山乱点头？
sentences.pinyin: shén me shàng shān zī niǔ niǔ? shén me xià shān luàn diǎn tóu?
sentences.translation: What goes up the mountain creaking? What goes down the mountain nodding?

sentences.hanzi: 车子上山吱扭扭，瘸子下山乱点头。
sentences.pinyin: chē zi shàng shān zī niǔ niǔ, qué zi xià shān luàn diǎn tóu.
sentences.translation: A cart goes up the mountain creaking, a lame person goes down nodding.

sentences.hanzi: 什么有腿家中坐？什么没腿游五洲？
sentences.pinyin: shén me yǒu tuǐ jiā zhōng zuò? shén me méi tuǐ yóu wǔ zhōu?
sentences.translation: What has legs and sits at home? What has no legs and travels the world?

sentences.hanzi: 板凳有腿儿家中坐，小船没腿儿游五洲。
sentences.pinyin: bǎn dèng yǒu tuǐ er jiā zhōng zuò, xiǎo chuán méi tuǐ er yóu wǔ zhōu.
sentences.translation: A stool has legs and sits at home, a boat has no legs and travels the world.

sentences.hanzi: 什么圆圆在天边？什么圆圆在眼前？
sentences.pinyin: shén me yuán yuán zài tiān biān? shén me yuán yuán zài yǎn qián?
sentences.translation: What is round in the sky? What is round before your eyes?

sentences.hanzi: 月亮圆圆在天边，眼睛圆圆在眼前。
sentences.pinyin: yuè liang yuán yuán zài tiān biān, yǎn jing yuán yuán zài yǎn qián.
sentences.translation: The moon is round in the sky, eyes are round before you.

sentences.hanzi: 什么开花节节高？什么开花一嘴毛？
sentences.pinyin: shén me kāi huā jié jié gāo? shén me kāi huā yī zuǐ máo?
sentences.translation: What blooms higher and higher? What blooms with a hairy mouth?

sentences.hanzi: 芝麻开花节节高，玉米开花一嘴毛。
sentences.pinyin: zhī ma kāi huā jié jié gāo, yù mǐ kāi huā yī zuǐ máo.
sentences.translation: Sesame blooms higher and higher, corn blooms with silk tassels.

sentences.hanzi: 天上看，满天星。地下看，有个坑。
sentences.pinyin: tiān shàng kàn, mǎn tiān xīng. dì xià kàn, yǒu ge kēng.
sentences.translation: Look up, the sky is full of stars. Look down, there is a pit.

sentences.hanzi: 坑里看，有盘冰。坑外长着一老松。
sentences.pinyin: kēng lǐ kàn, yǒu pán bīng. kēng wài zhǎng zhe yī lǎo sōng.
sentences.translation: In the pit, there is ice. Outside the pit grows an old pine tree.

sentences.hanzi: 松下坐着一老僧。僧前点着一盏灯。
sentences.pinyin: sōng xià zuò zhe yī lǎo sēng. sēng qián diǎn zhe yī zhǎn dēng.
sentences.translation: Under the pine sits an old monk. Before the monk burns a lamp.

sentences.hanzi: 灯前搁着一部经。
sentences.pinyin: dēng qián gē zhe yī bù jīng.
sentences.translation: Before the lamp lies a scripture.

sentences.hanzi: 说刮风，就刮风，刮得男女老少难把眼睛睁。
sentences.pinyin: shuō guā fēng, jiù guā fēng, guā de nán nǚ lǎo shào nán bǎ yǎn jing zhēng.
sentences.translation: When the wind blows, it blows so hard that people can hardly open their eyes.

sentences.hanzi: 刮散了天上的星，刮平了地下的坑。
sentences.pinyin: guā sàn le tiān shàng de xīng, guā píng le dì xià de kēng.
sentences.translation: It scattered the stars in the sky, leveled the pit on the ground.

sentences.hanzi: 刮化了坑里的冰，刮断了坑外的松。
sentences.pinyin: guā huà le kēng lǐ de bīng, guā duàn le kēng wài de sōng.
sentences.translation: It melted the ice in the pit, broke the pine tree outside the pit.

sentences.hanzi: 刮走了松下的僧，刮灭了僧前的灯，刮乱了灯前的经。
sentences.pinyin: guā zǒu le sōng xià de sēng, guā miè le sēng qián de dēng, guā luàn le dēng qián de jīng.
sentences.translation: It blew away the monk under the pine, extinguished the lamp before the monk, scattered the scripture before the lamp.

sentences.hanzi: 只刮得：星散、坑平、冰化、松倒、僧走、灯灭、经乱还不停。
sentences.pinyin: zhǐ guā de: xīng sàn, kēng píng, bīng huà, sōng dǎo, sēng zǒu, dēng miè, jīng luàn hái bù tíng.
sentences.translation: It kept blowing: stars scattered, pit leveled, ice melted, pine fell, monk left, lamp out, scripture scattered, and still not stopping.

sentences.hanzi: 请来玉皇大帝和孙悟空，制服风婆天下宁。
sentences.pinyin: qǐng lái yù huáng dà dì hé sūn wù kōng, zhì fú fēng pó tiān xià níng.
sentences.translation: Invite the Jade Emperor and Sun Wukong to subdue the Wind Goddess, and peace returns to the world.

sentences.hanzi: 我呀我呀总是觉得不可思议，
sentences.pinyin: wǒ ya wǒ ya zǒng shì jué de bù kě sī yì,
sentences.translation: I, oh I, always find it incredible,

sentences.hanzi: 乌黑的云彩里落下来的雨，怎么会变成了银色的雨滴？
sentences.pinyin: wū hēi de yún cǎi lǐ luò xià lái de yǔ, zěn me huì biàn chéng le yín sè de yǔ dī?
sentences.translation: How does rain falling from dark clouds turn into silver raindrops?

sentences.hanzi: 我呀我呀总是觉得不可思议，
sentences.pinyin: wǒ ya wǒ ya zǒng shì jué de bù kě sī yì,
sentences.translation: I, oh I, always find it incredible,

sentences.hanzi: 绿绿的桑树叶子吃到肚子里，蚕宝宝怎么长得白白胖胖的？
sentences.pinyin: lǜ lǜ de sāng shù yè zi chī dào dù zi lǐ, cán bǎo bao zěn me zhǎng de bái bái pàng pàng de?
sentences.translation: When silkworms eat green mulberry leaves, how do they grow white and chubby?

sentences.hanzi: 我呀我呀总是觉得不可思议，
sentences.pinyin: wǒ ya wǒ ya zǒng shì jué de bù kě sī yì,
sentences.translation: I, oh I, always find it incredible,

sentences.hanzi: 问谁谁都笑着对我说：那是当然的啦！
sentences.pinyin: wèn shuí shuí dōu xiào zhe duì wǒ shuō: nà shì dāng rán de la!
sentences.translation: Everyone I ask just smiles and says: That's natural, of course!

sentences.hanzi: 爱读书的树叶，捧着阳光读，一天一遍，读得兴奋满脸。
sentences.pinyin: ài dú shū de shù yè, pěng zhe yáng guāng dú, yī tiān yī biàn, dú de xīng fèn mǎn liǎn.
sentences.translation: The leaf who loves reading, reads holding the sunlight, once a day, reading with excitement on its face.

sentences.hanzi: 爱读书的树叶，捧着月光读，一夜一遍，读得平平安安。
sentences.pinyin: ài dú shū de shù yè, pěng zhe yuè guāng dú, yī yè yī biàn, dú de píng píng ān ān.
sentences.translation: The leaf who loves reading, reads holding the moonlight, once a night, reading peacefully.

sentences.hanzi: 一听说风老师来检查，每片树叶便摇头晃脑齐声朗读。
sentences.pinyin: yī tīng shuō fēng lǎo shī lái jiǎn chá, měi piàn shù yè biàn yáo tóu huàng nǎo qí shēng lǎng dú.
sentences.translation: Upon hearing Teacher Wind is coming to inspect, every leaf sways and reads aloud in unison.

sentences.hanzi: 头上红冠不用裁，满身雪白走将来。
sentences.pinyin: tóu shàng hóng guān bù yòng cái, mǎn shēn xuě bái zǒu jiāng lái.
sentences.translation: The red crown on its head needs no tailoring, its whole body snow-white as it struts forth.

sentences.hanzi: 平生不敢轻言语，一叫千门万户开。
sentences.pinyin: píng shēng bù gǎn qīng yán yǔ, yī jiào qiān mén wàn hù kāi.
sentences.translation: Throughout its life it dares not speak lightly, but one cry opens a thousand doors and ten thousand homes.
